body.name: [4D/4P Keystone] Projector With WiFi And Bluetooth 4K Supported, 750ANSI Lumens 2024 Upgraded, ONOAYO True 1080P Projector, Two-way Bluetooth, Compatible with iOS/Android/PC/PS4/TV Stick/HDMI/USB
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 11 hrs 56 mins
features: 【2024 Upgraded Projector From ONOAYO】:Boasts a native resolution of 1920 x 1080P & upgraded 750 ANSI LUMENS,the ONOAYO ONO1 Pro makes your movies shine with the intensity!The auto 4D/4P keystone correction make it easy to correct distorted images.

【User Friendly Projector With Low Noise】:ONOAYO's vision is to hope that all customers have their own high-quality home theater.After constant debugging, the noise of the ONO1 Pro Projector dropped to 25-35dB.You can enjoy movies, games, etc with crisp and clear sound, without worrying about any distracting noise.

【Be A Powerful Home Speaker】:It's not just the visuals that make the ONOAYO ONO1 Pro Blutooth Projector stand out. This newest model of ONOAYO also features a built-in two-way blueooth 5.2 function so you can easily connect your bluetooth audio devices at any time& ONO1 Pro can also double up as your powerful speaker.

【A True Wireless Connection Projector】:The WiFi Projector of ONO1 Pro specifically optimizes network congestion with WiFi 6 tech,also compatible with 2.4G and 5G networks.Based on the new security protocol, WiFi 6 has higher security and more faster.Due to HDCP copyright,copyrighted content from Hulu, Netflix, Amazon Prime, etc CAN NOT be mirrored or screen-cast,but you could plug an Amazon fire stick, or similar device to connect.

【Abundant Connection Choices】:The ONO1 Pro 5G WiFi Bluetooth Projector comes with a variety of inputs and devices plus Screen Mirroring Function, including built-in HDMI, USB, AV, and a 3.5mm audio jack.Wired or Wireless,it's all up to you!Ready to try it without risky!Beacause we have an honest and relible customer service team!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ONOAYO ONO1 Pro Version is coming!Meets all your requirements for a high-end home video projector. 1:Up to 750 ANSI lumens, 4K support & Native 1080P with outstanding brightness present exceptional projection picture.Tiny hair of a bird and a man’s subtle expression can be clearly visible. 2:Stable and Fast Wifi 6 technology, brings lag-free online images and videos for you on the large screen,also support 5G/2.4G Dual-WiFi! 3:Upgraded with Two-way Bluetooth Function , it can be used as a Bluetooth speaker, save your money to buy another speaker. Receive Bluetooth signal from over 50ft away. 4:Digital ±50° 4D/4P and 50% zoom function, can be adjusted with the remote.Cumbersome setting by moving the home proyector manually would be a thing of the past. 5:Sealed Optical Engine prevents dust entering the machine, protect picture quality and prolong service life of the 4K video projector. 6:Powerful, convenient and cost-effective: You deserve an ONOAYO today! NOTE:The diffuse reflectance principle of projectors means that they are subject to ambient light. Expensive commercial projectors are typically used during the day, so most of the budget is allocated to brightness. Home projectors are more oriented towards improving picture quality and color. Although the ONO1 projector is already brighter than other projectors in the same range on the market, I recommend using it in a dimly lit environment to enjoy the immersive atmosphere of watching a movie with the best results.(as if you were in a movie theater.)

Wireless, Immersive, Fantastic! ONO1 Native 1080P WiFi Bluetooth projector updated the projection screen size from 100” to 300”. Together with the full HD 1920*1080P Resolution 20000:1 high contrast ratio, high bright and innovative WiFi & Bluetooth & 4P/4D Keystone Correction tech, delivers a streaming experience for playing games, watching movies or any kinds of entertaining content on the big screen. Please Note: Due to HDCP copyright, all LCD wireless projector doesn't support Netflix, Amazon Prime and Hulu, but you could use amazon fire stick.Make sure your mobile device is close to the projector when using wireless connection.:) Thanks Marvin from NY for the reminder: Samsung device users need to use Smart View.Some mobile devices may not support screen mirroring due to the compatibility.(Such as Google pixel phone)If Dolby icon on your screen, please check the Audio Setting on your Amazon Fire TV and try turning off Dolby Digital Plus: On your Amazon Fire TV or Fire TV Stick, go to Settings > Display & Sounds > Audio > Dolby Digital Output > and then turn Dolby Digital Plus OFF OR choose the PCM (Setup-Audio output-PCM)We have prepared many Instructive videos so you can learn how to operate it visually, if need it please let us know.The projector accommodates USB drives format: FAT16, FAT32, or NTFS with up to 1TB of memory. If not you can reformat the USB drive from other format to these 3 kinds of formats.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Projector for this Amazing Price!
reviews.reviewText: I have bought much more expensive projectors from Epson, LG etc... and I think this delivers 90% of that at a fraction of the cost ($900 versus about $140 for this projector). The Customer Service is Outstanding, and very effective plus Responsive. And it has Bluetooth, WiFi, and Easy Keystone adjustments. Built in Speaker is adequate (but blue tooth it to an external one for truly amazing sound). Can also Mirror my iPhone effortlessly! It certainly needs a dark-ish room... my media room has no windows, and is perfect for this projector. It is certainly not as bright as a LED TV, but overall experience is awesome! And Value is A+If you want a budget Projector, this one is IT!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Zoom function can be adjusted with the remote.
reviews.reviewText: It can be used as a Bluetooth speaker that is very cool . I like this product very much and add a lot of functions, especially zoom function, can be adjusted with the remote. With a remote, you can reduce the image size from 100% to 50% without moving the portable projector This is my favorite change. It is very easy to set up ，It is easy to connect to iPhone or iPad. Of course, when you encounter some connection problems, please consider restarting and the problem will be solved.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clear and worth the money
reviews.reviewText: It's works well during night time or when all curton is closed properly. you need some set up time to make sure the focus and shape is right. I have a screen for it but it also works if you just used it directly on the wall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic Product and Top-Notch Customer Service – Thanks to Aniya!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I recently purchased the ONO1 Pro projector, drawn in by its affordable price and promising features. While the initial unit encountered a minor hiccup with a blurry image on one side, the exceptional customer service provided by the seller, and particularly Aniya, transformed this experience into a positive one.Upon reaching out to the seller regarding the image issue, Aniya promptly responded with incredible assistance. Her expertise was evident as she provided detailed instructions on how to calibrate the lens to rectify the problem. I appreciated the clarity and ease of the instructions, showcasing the seller's commitment to customer satisfaction.Despite my efforts, the issue persisted, prompting me to contact Aniya once again. Without hesitation, she initiated the process for a replacement unit. I was pleasantly surprised by the speed at which the new projector was dispatched. The efficiency displayed in handling the situation was truly commendable.The ONO1 Pro projector itself has proven to be a stellar purchase. The image quality is outstanding, and the features offered at such an affordable price point make it a standout choice in the market. The vivid colors, sharp resolution, and overall performance have exceeded my expectations.I want to express my sincere gratitude to Aniya for her unwavering support throughout this process. Her professionalism and dedication to ensuring customer satisfaction have been instrumental in turning what could have been a frustrating experience into a positive one. Aniya's assistance reflects highly on the seller's commitment to providing an excellent product and unparalleled customer service.In conclusion, I wholeheartedly recommend the ONO1 Pro projector for its impressive features and affordability, backed by a seller and customer service team that goes above and beyond. Thank you, Aniya, for your outstanding support and for making this purchase a truly satisfying experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Projector and Great Customer Service
reviews.reviewText: I had originally purchased the ONOAYO ONO1 projector for my daughter last Christmas. She used it daily and was very happy with the picture quality. A few weeks ago the projector started having some issues with what we thought might be the bulb. I emailed Support at support_us@onoayo.net describing the issue and they quickly responded by sending us a replacement projector, and it's the upgraded model! I would highly recommend contacting Support if there are any problems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Video Quality, Great Customer support
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the Onoayo projector in November 2021 after I buying and trying with other projectors like RCA and all. I was very satisfied with quality of the product, picture stability and i am successful in achieving home theatre system in Home by pairing with JBL 9.1. Speakers system.We watch movies on weekends and watching through this projector and JBL 9.1 made me full satisfaction of watching movies in theater way with high quality experience.While using heavily, I started getting blue background and I reported this issue to support_us@onoayo.net through email. Immediately after a week I got corresponding technical support and finally Onoayo sent new projector even after more than usage of almost 2 years.support_us@onoayo.net Provides excellent customer support and care for the customer’s like me when there are any issues.Quick shout out to Anika from customer support team for great customer service.I recommend others to buy this product if you would like to achieve home theatre experience in home with more stability and quality with economical priceI will definitely plan to buy their products going forward due to their excellent service and commitmentThanksPrabhakar ViswaradhyaUSA

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dim projection resolved! Great customer service!
reviews.reviewText: Love this projector! After a year the picture went dim, I was pretty disappoint, because it seemed too soon for the bulb to be affected. I contacted support and Aniya quickly responded. All I had to do was factory reset the projector and it was good to go!Thanks for the speedy response and solution Aniya!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy to buy this projector. The picture is very clear, and it can be enlarged to the entire wall. It is easy to adjust the focus. It can also be connected to a variety of players. It is also very convenient to carry. The speaker can meet basic needs! One suggestion is to cover the lens with a cap, I hope it can be made easy to snap on!

reviews.reviewTitle: 安くて面白いおもちゃゲットだぜ！
reviews.reviewText: 白い壁ならどこでも映せるしWi-Fiで画像映すから配線もいらないとりあえず天井に映してみたけど電気付けててもながら見なら十分電気消したら画像もキレイ中華スマホだからか YouTubeも普通にキャストできた！wバックグラウンドモードにすると音がプロジェクター本体からでるからこれ用にChromecast買おうと思う HDMI端子ついてるしこのプロジェクター色々使えるわヘッドホン端子ついてるからスピーカーで音出して 筋トレ中にミュージックビデオながら見もいいね！本体が結構熱もつからYouTube見ながら 寝落ちはやめたほうがいいかな
The media could not be loaded. Reflecting images and videos at its best. I don't even need a screen on behind it, can project direct on the wall. Awesome!!

この投影機は、その便利な機能とHDMI接続の可能性により、私の生活を大きく豊かにしました！まず、その便利さについて。セットアップが簡単で、初めて使う方でも迷わずに設置できます。コンパクトなデザインなので、持ち運びも楽々。家族や友人との映画鑑賞やプレゼンテーションなど、さまざまなシーンで活躍してくれます。そして、HDMI接続の優れた機能。これまでの投影機では、デバイスとの接続が面倒だったことがありましたが、この投影機はHDMIポートを備えているため、テレビ、コンピュータ、ゲーム機など、多くの機器と簡単に接続できます。高画質な映像や音声が楽しめるため、映画やゲームの体験が格段に向上しました。さらに、HDMI接続によってワイヤレスでの映像転送も可能です。複雑なケーブルの取り回しに悩まされることなく、スムーズに映像を共有できます。家族や仲間との集まりで、楽しい時間を共有することができました。投影機の利便性とHDMI接続の素晴らしい特徴により、私の日常生活がより便利に、より楽しいものとなりました。この投影機を手に入れてから、家族や友人とのコミュニケーションが深まり、充実した時間を過ごすことができています。心からおすすめします！

reviews.reviewerName: すけえもんすけえもん
reviews.reviewText: 家で映画やゲームを大画面で楽しみたく購入しました。プロジェクターの購入ははじめてだったので、画質面は正直そこまで期待していませんでしたがいい意味で予想を裏切られました。macと接続して投影しましたがかなりクリアの画質で満足です。スクリーンがなくても白い壁なら十分です。本体もコンパクトで持ち運びも簡単。

reviews.reviewText: コンパクトでデザインもいいところが良かったです
